original_text: When you lend money to people, you may take something from them as a guarantee. But do not take the stones that they use to make grain into flour. Do not take either of the stones. People need both those stones to make food to stay alive. So do not take away their life.
korean_text: 사람이 맷돌이나 그 위짝을 전당 잡지 말지니 이는 그 생명을 전당 잡음이니라

sentences.original_text: When you lend money to people
you may take something from them as a guarantee
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그들에게서 담보물을 받을 수 있으나

sentences.original_text: But do not take the stones that they use to make grain into flour
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 곡식을 가루로 만드는 데 쓰는 맷돌을 가져서는 안 되며

sentences.original_text: Do not take either of the stones
People need both those stones to make food to stay alive
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 생명을 유지하기 위해 음식을 만들기 위해 두 개의 맷돌이 모두 필요하기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: So do not take away their life
